stdout:
Table	Create Table
system_settings	CREATE TABLE `system_settings` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `settingKey` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `settingValue` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_setting_key` (`settingKey`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
